videos.title: Battle in Bentonville | Little Sugar MTB 100k 2025
videos.description:
The penultimate round of the Lifetime Grand Prix brought riders to Bentonville, Arkansas for the Little Sugar 100K and it turned into pure chaos.

Razor-sharp rocks, loose descents, and brutal climbs shredded tires, bodies, and ambitions. What started as a fast mountain bike race quickly became a battle of survival.

For Russell Finsterwald, the stakes were high. Sitting just outside the top ten in the Grand Prix standings, this was his chance to claw back valuable points before the series finale next weekend at Big Sugar.

Follow along as we capture the highs, lows and carnage from one of the wildest races of the year. From mid-race repairs to gritty comebacks, this vlog dives into what it takes to survive the rock-strewn chaos of Little Sugar.

🏁 Location: Bentonville, Arkansas
🚴 Event: Little Sugar 100K — Lifetime Grand Prix Round 6🎥 Rider: Kerry Werner

Support From: 
Bikeflights
Continental
Arkansas- The Natural State

Special Thanks to
Rise Records
- Angels & Airwaves - Kiss & Tell  
- Dance Gavin Dance - The Stickler
- Memphis May Fire - Bleed Me Dry
- Alkaline Trio - Bad Time
- Sum 41 - Landmines
- Sum 41 - Dopamine

Additional video support- Avery Stumm, Landon Burnley, and Tyler Cloutier

videos.title: 2025 Life Time Little Sugar MTB Race Highlights
videos.description:
Watch every switchback, crash, flat, and chase from the 2025 Life Time Grand Prix’s bona fide mountain bike race and penultimate stop—the rigorous Life Time Little Sugar MTB. 
 
Follow along as both men's and women's races shake out in the Ozarks of Northwest Arkansas and bring the overall standings into focus with only one race left. From mechanicals to steady leaders to persistent chase groups, the 2025 season is nearing its end but still far from over... 
 
🎥  Be sure to set your alarms to watch Life Time Big Sugar Gravel presented by Kenetik LIVE on Saturday, October 18 at 7:10am CST. 
 
Official podium jersey presented by Pas Normal Studios. 
 
Learn more about the Life Time Grand Prix: lifetimegrandprix.com 
Learn more about Little Sugar MTB: bigsugarclassic.com

videos.title: Full Throttle | Ep. 5 - Little Sugar mtb  | Every corner counts.
videos.description:
Welcome to our 6 part series about the 2025 Lifetime Grand Prix - Full Throttle. Our goal is to document Alexey's attempt to win the overall after watching Keegan win it 3 years in a row. 4 races down and we are now in Bentonville, Arkansas for the finale of the LTGP. Little Sugar MTB up first for a test of technical skills and equipment!

Special thanks to Road iD and Chamois Butt'r for making this possible! 

Road iD: https://www.roadid.com/
Chamois Butt'r: https://www.chamoisbuttr.com/

Further thanks to:
Kerry Warner & Sherm
John Matthews
Danny Awang
Lifetime Fitness

Merch: alexeyandavery.com
